Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, we are confident it will be a valuable addition to your business or lifestyle. We are offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750000. This opportunity is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also maximizing our earnings. We look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
